REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2418 reute u f BC-LONDON-INTERNATIONAL 06-18 0082

TEXT.TITLE: LONDON INTERNATIONAL RAISE PROFITS BY 3.05 MLN
TEXT.BODY: Year to March 31 Final dividend 3.65p vs 3.1p making 5.4p vs 4.6p Share 14.11p vs 12.13p Pre-tax profit 27.11 mln stg vs 24.06 mln Net profit 18.12 mln vs 15.21 mln Turnover 252.11 mln vs 225.29 mln Note - London International Group Plc <LONL.L> said that sharply increased sales of condoms had led to a particularly strong start to the year and it had considerable confidence for the future. REUTER
